content: same thing only different same thing only different designed by cheryl schumer one of my mother s favorite sayings was same thing only different when referring to two things that were pretty much the same but with a difference - such as two dresses made from the same pattern but with a different fabric it s a perfect name for this wrap because it s just a simple shape you can make it with different yarn different gauge or different stitch patterns and it can be made seamed or seamless you can wear it with the rectangular edge in back for a cowl neckline in the front or go for a more asymmetrical look by centering the rectangular edge down one arm however you choose to make it or wear it it will be the same thing only different pattern notes please read the basic shape of this design is a long rectangle which is folded into a u shape with the ends seamed together part way up the center of the u if you prefer not to have a seam the instructions include a seamless version as well this pattern is divided into two sections same thing which gives specific instructions for the two versions of the wrap shown in the pattern photos and only different which gives general guidelines for creating your own version even if you want to knit the wrap according to one of the sets of instructions i recommend looking through the only different section before you start abbreviations k knit p purl rs right side st s stitch es ws wrong side seamed version shown in linen seamless version shown in mohair/silk same thing only different v1 0 page 1 of 5 copyright 2012 - cheryl schumer same thing detailed instructions please note that the needle size and finished size dimensions are different for the two versions this was intentional because of the difference in the yarn qualities the silk/mohair wrap was knit slightly wider because it has less drape than the linen seamed version shown in linen finished size approximately 14 x56 after blocking but before seaming after seaming folded at the center front to form a flat rectangle 14 wide by 28 long materials  yarn shibui knits linen 100% linen 246 yds/225 m per skein in colorway sidewalk 2 skeins  knitting needles 1 set us 9/5 5mm straight or circular needles or size to obtain gauge  yarn needle  blocking pins or wires gauge 17 5 sts and 22 row = 4 /10cm in stockinette adjust your needle size if needed to get the correct gauge please be sure to read the determine your gauge information in the only different section below special note for this yarn i used the entire two skeins except for my swatch so be careful that your gauge is correct or you may run out of yarn when i made the wrap i knit the length as far as i could leaving just enough
